inclusion.criterion: Currently taking antipsychotics or mood stabilizers
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Good adherence to medications as recorded by chart
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Competent to understand the informed consent and have motivation to decrease their body weight
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unstable psychiatric symptoms or physical condition that may interfere the adherence of medication
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Medical conditions such as endocrine disease, heart disease, allergy or immunology disease, or impaired liver function (high aminotransferases, alanine, aspartate >80 IU/L or serum creatinine >2.5 mg/dl)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Management for weight control within 3 months
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple medical conditions, including CHF, CAD, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome, which may interfere with medication adherence. Additionally, patient is experiencing agitation and altered mental status, which may be indicative of unstable psychiatric symptoms.
